sn22.30:1.2: “Mendicants, the arising, continuation, and manifestation and regeneration of form is the arising of suffering, the continuation of diseases, and the manifestation of old age and death.
sn22.30:1.3: The arising, continuation, and manifestation and regeneration of feeling …
sn22.30:1.6: consciousness is the arising of suffering, the continuation of diseases, and the manifestation of old age and death.
sn22.30:1.7: The cessation, settling, and disappearance of form is the cessation of suffering, the settling of diseases, and the disappearance of old age and death.
sn22.30:1.8: The cessation, settling, and ending of feeling …
sn22.30:1.11: consciousness is the cessation of suffering, the settling of diseases, and the disappearance of old age and death.”
